00029 /// Tracks the status of a build: completion fraction, printing updates.
00030 struct BuildStatus {
00031   BuildStatus();
00032   void PlanHasTotalEdges(int total);
00033   void BuildEdgeStarted(Edge* edge);
00034   /// Returns the time the edge took, in ms.
00035   int BuildEdgeFinished(Edge* edge);
00036 
00037   void PrintStatus(Edge* edge);
00038 
00039   time_t last_update_;
00040   int finished_edges_, total_edges_;
00041 
00042   typedef map<Edge*, timeval> RunningEdgeMap;
00043   RunningEdgeMap running_edges_;
00044 
00045   BuildConfig::Verbosity verbosity_;
00046   /// Whether we can do fancy terminal control codes.
00047   bool smart_terminal_;
00048 };
00049 
00050 BuildStatus::BuildStatus()
00051     : last_update_(time(NULL)), finished_edges_(0), total_edges_(0),
00052       verbosity_(BuildConfig::NORMAL) {
00053 #ifndef WIN32
00054   const char* term = getenv("TERM");
00055   smart_terminal_ = isatty(1) && term && string(term) != "dumb";
00056 #else
00057   smart_terminal_ = false;
00058 #endif
00059 }
00060 
00061 void BuildStatus::PlanHasTotalEdges(int total) {
00062   total_edges_ = total;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void BuildStatus::BuildEdgeStarted(Edge* edge) {
00066   timeval now;
00067   gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
00068   running_edges_.insert(make_pair(edge, now));
00069 
00070   PrintStatus(edge);
00071 }
00072 
00073 int BuildStatus::BuildEdgeFinished(Edge* edge) {
00074   timeval now;
00075   gettimeofday(&now, NULL);
00076   ++finished_edges_;
00077 
00078   if (verbosity_ != BuildConfig::QUIET) {
00079     if (smart_terminal_ && verbosity_ == BuildConfig::NORMAL) {
00080       PrintStatus(edge);
00081       if (finished_edges_ == total_edges_)
00082         printf("\n");
00083     } else {
00084       if (now.tv_sec - last_update_ > 5) {
00085         printf("%.1f%% %d/%d\n", finished_edges_ * 100 / (float)total_edges_,
00086                finished_edges_, total_edges_);
00087         last_update_ = now.tv_sec;
00088       }
00089     }
00090   }
00091 
00092   RunningEdgeMap::iterator i = running_edges_.find(edge);
00093   timeval delta;
00094   timersub(&now, &i->second, &delta);
00095   int ms = (delta.tv_sec * 1000) + (delta.tv_usec / 1000);
00096   running_edges_.erase(i);
00097 
00098   return ms;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void BuildStatus::PrintStatus(Edge* edge) {
00102   switch (verbosity_) {
00103   case BuildConfig::QUIET:
00104     return;
00105 
00106   case BuildConfig::VERBOSE:
00107     printf("%s\n", edge->EvaluateCommand().c_str());
00108     break;
00109 
00110   default: {
00111     string to_print = edge->GetDescription();
00112     if (to_print.empty() || verbosity_ == BuildConfig::VERBOSE)
00113       to_print = edge->EvaluateCommand();
00114 #ifndef WIN32
00115     if (smart_terminal_) {
00116       // Limit output to width of the terminal if provided so we don't cause
00117       // line-wrapping.
00118       winsize size;
00119       if ((ioctl(0, TIOCGWINSZ, &size) == 0) && size.ws_col) {
00120         const int kMargin = 15;  // Space for [xxx/yyy] and "...".
00121         if (to_print.size() + kMargin > size.ws_col) {
00122           int substr = std::min(to_print.size(),
00123                                 to_print.size() + kMargin - size.ws_col);
00124           to_print = "..." + to_print.substr(substr);
00125         }
00126       }
00127 
00128       printf("\r[%d/%d] %s\e[K", finished_edges_, total_edges_,
00129              to_print.c_str());
00130       fflush(stdout);
00131     } else
00132 #endif
00133     {
00134       printf("%s\n", to_print.c_str());
00135     }
00136   }
00137   }
00138 }

00140 Plan::Plan() : command_edges_(0) {}
00141 
00142 bool Plan::AddTarget(Node* node, string* err) {
00143   vector<Node*> stack;
00144   return AddSubTarget(node, &stack, err);
00145 }
00146 
00147 bool Plan::AddSubTarget(Node* node, vector<Node*>* stack, string* err) {
00148   Edge* edge = node->in_edge_;
00149   if (!edge) {  // Leaf node.
00150     if (node->dirty_) {
00151       string referenced;
00152       if (!stack->empty())
00153         referenced = ", needed by '" + stack->back()->file_->path_ + "',";
00154       *err = "'" + node->file_->path_ + "'" + referenced + " missing "
00155              "and no known rule to make it";
00156     }
00157     return false;
00158   }
00159   assert(edge);
00160 
00161   if (CheckDependencyCycle(node, stack, err))
00162     return false;
00163 
00164   if (!node->dirty())
00165     return false;  // Don't need to do anything.
00166   if (want_.find(edge) != want_.end())
00167     return true;  // We've already enqueued it.
00168   want_.insert(edge);
00169   if (!edge->is_phony())
00170     ++command_edges_;
00171 
00172   stack->push_back(node);
00173   bool awaiting_inputs = false;
00174   for (vector<Node*>::iterator i = edge->inputs_.begin();
00175        i != edge->inputs_.end(); ++i) {
00176     if (!edge->is_implicit(i - edge->inputs_.begin()) &&
00177         AddSubTarget(*i, stack, err)) {
00178       awaiting_inputs = true;
00179     } else if (!err->empty()) {
00180       return false;
00181     }
00182   }
00183   assert(stack->back() == node);
00184   stack->pop_back();
00185 
00186   if (!awaiting_inputs)
00187     ready_.insert(edge);
00188 
00189   return true;
00190 }
00191 
00192 bool Plan::CheckDependencyCycle(Node* node, vector<Node*>* stack, string* err) {
00193   vector<Node*>::reverse_iterator ri =
00194       find(stack->rbegin(), stack->rend(), node);
00195   if (ri == stack->rend())
00196     return false;
00197 
00198   // Add this node onto the stack to make it clearer where the loop
00199   // is.
00200   stack->push_back(node);
00201 
00202   vector<Node*>::iterator start = find(stack->begin(), stack->end(), node);
00203   *err = "dependency cycle: ";
00204   for (vector<Node*>::iterator i = start; i != stack->end(); ++i) {
00205     if (i != start)
00206       err->append(" -> ");
00207     err->append((*i)->file_->path_);
00208   }
00209   return true;
00210 }
00211 
00212 Edge* Plan::FindWork() {
00213   if (ready_.empty())
00214     return NULL;
00215   set<Edge*>::iterator i = ready_.begin();
00216   Edge* edge = *i;
00217   ready_.erase(i);
00218   return edge;
00219 }
00220 
00221 void Plan::EdgeFinished(Edge* edge) {
00222   want_.erase(edge);
00223 
00224   // Check off any nodes we were waiting for with this edge.
00225   for (vector<Node*>::iterator i = edge->outputs_.begin();
00226        i != edge->outputs_.end(); ++i) {
00227     NodeFinished(*i);
00228   }
00229 }
00230 
00231 void Plan::NodeFinished(Node* node) {
00232   // See if we we want any edges from this node.
00233   for (vector<Edge*>::iterator i = node->out_edges_.begin();
00234        i != node->out_edges_.end(); ++i) {
00235     if (want_.find(*i) != want_.end()) {
00236       // See if the edge is now ready.
00237       bool ready = true;
00238       for (vector<Node*>::iterator j = (*i)->inputs_.begin();
00239            j != (*i)->inputs_.end(); ++j) {
00240         if ((*j)->dirty()) {
00241           ready = false;
00242           break;
00243         }
00244       }
00245       if (ready)
00246         ready_.insert(*i);
00247     }
00248   }
00249 }
00250 
00251 void Plan::Dump() {
00252   printf("pending: %d\n", (int)want_.size());
00253   for (set<Edge*>::iterator i = want_.begin(); i != want_.end(); ++i) {
00254     (*i)->Dump();
00255   }
00256   printf("ready: %d\n", (int)ready_.size());
00257 }

00259 struct RealCommandRunner : public CommandRunner {
00260   RealCommandRunner(const BuildConfig& config) : config_(config) {}
00261   virtual ~RealCommandRunner() {}
00262   virtual bool CanRunMore();
00263   virtual bool StartCommand(Edge* edge);
00264   virtual bool WaitForCommands();
00265   virtual Edge* NextFinishedCommand(bool* success);
00266 
00267   const BuildConfig& config_;
00268   SubprocessSet subprocs_;
00269   map<Subprocess*, Edge*> subproc_to_edge_;
00270 };
00271 
00272 bool RealCommandRunner::CanRunMore() {
00273   return ((int)subprocs_.running_.size()) < config_.parallelism;
00274 }
00275 
00276 bool RealCommandRunner::StartCommand(Edge* edge) {
00277   string command = edge->EvaluateCommand();
00278   Subprocess* subproc = new Subprocess;
00279   subproc_to_edge_.insert(make_pair(subproc, edge));
00280   if (!subproc->Start(command))
00281     return false;
00282 
00283   subprocs_.Add(subproc);
00284   return true;
00285 }
00286 
00287 bool RealCommandRunner::WaitForCommands() {
00288   if (subprocs_.running_.empty())
00289     return false;
00290 
00291   while (subprocs_.finished_.empty()) {
00292     subprocs_.DoWork();
00293   }
00294   return true;
00295 }
00296 
00297 Edge* RealCommandRunner::NextFinishedCommand(bool* success) {
00298   Subprocess* subproc = subprocs_.NextFinished();
00299   if (!subproc)
00300     return NULL;
00301 
00302   *success = subproc->Finish();
00303 
00304   map<Subprocess*, Edge*>::iterator i = subproc_to_edge_.find(subproc);
00305   Edge* edge = i->second;
00306   subproc_to_edge_.erase(i);
00307 
00308   if (!*success ||
00309       !subproc->stdout_.buf_.empty() ||
00310       !subproc->stderr_.buf_.empty()) {
00311     // Print the command that is spewing before printing its output.
00312     // Print the full command when it failed, otherwise the short name if
00313     // available.
00314     string to_print = edge->GetDescription();
00315     if (to_print.empty() ||
00316         config_.verbosity == BuildConfig::VERBOSE ||
00317         !*success) {
00318       to_print = edge->EvaluateCommand();
00319     }
00320 
00321     printf("\n%s%s\n", *success ? "" : "FAILED: ", to_print.c_str());
00322     if (!subproc->stdout_.buf_.empty())
00323       printf("%s\n", subproc->stdout_.buf_.c_str());
00324     if (!subproc->stderr_.buf_.empty())
00325       printf("%s\n", subproc->stderr_.buf_.c_str());
00326   }
00327 
00328   delete subproc;
00329   return edge;
00330 }
00331 
00332 /// A CommandRunner that doesn't actually run the commands.
00333 struct DryRunCommandRunner : public CommandRunner {
00334   virtual ~DryRunCommandRunner() {}
00335   virtual bool CanRunMore() {
00336     return true;
00337   }
00338   virtual bool StartCommand(Edge* edge) {
00339     finished_.push(edge);
00340     return true;
00341   }
00342   virtual bool WaitForCommands() {
00343     return true;
00344   }
00345   virtual Edge* NextFinishedCommand(bool* success) {
00346     if (finished_.empty())
00347       return NULL;
00348     *success = true;
00349     Edge* edge = finished_.front();
00350     finished_.pop();
00351     return edge;
00352   }
00353 
00354   queue<Edge*> finished_;
00355 };
00356 
00357 Builder::Builder(State* state, const BuildConfig& config)
00358     : state_(state) {
00359   disk_interface_ = new RealDiskInterface;
00360   if (config.dry_run)
00361     command_runner_ = new DryRunCommandRunner;
00362   else
00363     command_runner_ = new RealCommandRunner(config);
00364   status_ = new BuildStatus;
00365   status_->verbosity_ = config.verbosity;
00366   log_ = state->build_log_;
00367 }
00368 
00369 Node* Builder::AddTarget(const string& name, string* err) {
00370   Node* node = state_->LookupNode(name);
00371   if (!node) {
00372     *err = "unknown target: '" + name + "'";
00373     return NULL;
00374   }
00375   node->file_->StatIfNecessary(disk_interface_);
00376   if (node->in_edge_) {
00377     if (!node->in_edge_->RecomputeDirty(state_, disk_interface_, err))
00378       return NULL;
00379   }
00380   if (!node->dirty_)
00381     return NULL;  // Intentionally no error.
00382 
00383   if (!plan_.AddTarget(node, err))
00384     return NULL;
00385   return node;
00386 }
00387 
00388 bool Builder::Build(string* err) {
00389   if (!plan_.more_to_do()) {
00390     *err = "no work to do";
00391     return true;
00392   }
00393 
00394   status_->PlanHasTotalEdges(plan_.command_edge_count());
00395   while (plan_.more_to_do()) {
00396     while (command_runner_->CanRunMore()) {
00397       Edge* edge = plan_.FindWork();
00398       if (!edge)
00399         break;
00400 
00401       if (!StartEdge(edge, err))
00402         return false;
00403 
00404       if (edge->is_phony())
00405         FinishEdge(edge);
00406     }
00407 
00408     if (!plan_.more_to_do())
00409       break;
00410 
00411     bool success;
00412     if (Edge* edge = command_runner_->NextFinishedCommand(&success)) {
00413       if (!success) {
00414         *err = "subcommand failed";
00415         return false;
00416       }
00417       FinishEdge(edge);
00418     } else {
00419       if (!command_runner_->WaitForCommands()) {
00420         *err = "stuck [this is a bug]";
00421         return false;
00422       }
00423     }
00424   }
00425 
00426   return true;
00427 }
00428 
00429 bool Builder::StartEdge(Edge* edge, string* err) {
00430   if (edge->is_phony())
00431     return true;
00432 
00433   status_->BuildEdgeStarted(edge);
00434 
00435   // Create directories necessary for outputs.
00436   // XXX: this will block; do we care?
00437   for (vector<Node*>::iterator i = edge->outputs_.begin();
00438        i != edge->outputs_.end(); ++i) {
00439     if (!disk_interface_->MakeDirs((*i)->file_->path_))
00440       return false;
00441   }
00442 
00443   // Compute command and start it.
00444   string command = edge->EvaluateCommand();
00445   if (!command_runner_->StartCommand(edge)) {
00446     err->assign("command '" + command + "' failed.");
00447     return false;
00448   }
00449 
00450   return true;
00451 }
00452 
00453 void Builder::FinishEdge(Edge* edge) {
00454   for (vector<Node*>::iterator i = edge->outputs_.begin();
00455        i != edge->outputs_.end(); ++i) {
00456     // XXX check that the output actually changed
00457     // XXX just notify node and have it propagate?
00458     (*i)->dirty_ = false;
00459   }
00460   plan_.EdgeFinished(edge);
00461 
00462   if (edge->is_phony())
00463     return;
00464 
00465   int ms = status_->BuildEdgeFinished(edge);
00466   if (log_)
00467     log_->RecordCommand(edge, ms);
00468 }
